cards.name: Jon Arryn
cards.text: Insight. Interrupt: When Jon Arryn is killed, kneel your faction card to have each player with an equal or lower initiative value than you stand a King or Small Council character they control, if able. Then, following the challenges phase this round, there is an additional challenges phase.

cards.name: The King in the Narrow Sea
cards.text: Unique [baratheon] character only. Reaction: After you lose initiative, return a Mercenary or Smuggler character you control to its owner's hand to kneel a character and a location with a lower printed cost. -1 Initiative.

cards.name: The Reader's Septon
cards.text: Action: Kneel The Reader's Septon to choose a player. Swap the top and bottom card of that player's deck.

cards.name: Torrhen's Square
cards.text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After a [greyjoy] card comes out of shadows, kneel Torrhen's Square. For each Raider character you control, discard the top card of each opponent's deck who has an equal or higher initiative value than you. -2 Initiative.

cards.name: The Halfman's Horde
cards.text: Assault. Intimidate. No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which The Halfman's Horde is attacking, discard 1 card at random from the losing opponents hand for each unique attacking Clansman character.

cards.name: The Warden of the West
cards.text: [lannister] Lord character only. Reaction: After any number of cards are discarded from an opponent's hand during the challenges phase, if you do not support that player, draw cards equal to the amount of cards discarded. (Limit once per round).

cards.name: Doran Martell
cards.text: Shadow (5). Insight. Each card in your shadow area without the printed shadow keyword gains shadow (3). Reaction: After you lose dominance, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Place 1 into shadows and place the other on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: A Traitor's Whisper
cards.text: Play only if you have a card with shadows in your discard pile. Action: Choose and reveal a card in each player's shadows area, if able. You may put these cards into play.

cards.name: Craster's Keep Mutineer
cards.text: Reaction: After Craster's Keep Mutineer enters play, choose and discard a duplicate from play.

cards.name: Defensive Debris
cards.text: Bestow (2). Challenges Action: Discard 1 gold from Defensive Debris to choose a card in an opponents discard pile. Until the end of the phase, cards with that printed cost cannot be played or enter play. (Max once per phase.)

cards.name: Crannogmen
cards.text: Shadow (3). Stealth. Reaction: After a House Reed card enters play, place a poison token on a character controlled by an opponent. Then, if the number of poison tokens are equal or higher than that characters STR, return Crannogmen to shadows to kill it.

cards.name: The Wolf's Den
cards.text: Reaction: After a character you control is sacrificed or killed, kneel The Wolf's Den to place the bottom card of your deck into shadows with a shadow token on it. While that card is in shadows, it gains shadow (X). X is its printed cost.

cards.name: Lysono Maar
cards.text:
Insight.
During the first challenge you initiate each phase, your opponent may declare defenders before you declare attackers, and cannot declare defenders after you declare attackers.
cards.designer: Card design by 2017 European Joust Champion, Reinhard Schefcik.

cards.name: The Balerion
cards.text: While you control Captain Groleo, he gains the Commander trait and a [power] icon. Challenges Action: Kneel The Balerion to attach it to an Army or Stormborn character you control as a Weapon attachment with the text: "Terminal. Attached character gains assault during [power] challenges."

cards.name: Ser Robar Royce
cards.text:
Ser Robar Royce cannot be declared as an attacker or defender during the first challenge initiated by you, and the first challenge initiated against you.
-1 Initiative.
cards.flavor: Ser Robar had hung back, uncertain, but now he was reaching for his hilt.

cards.name: A Wall of Roses
cards.text: Reaction: After an attacking character is removed from a challenge, choose X defending characters. If you win this challenge, gain 2 power and stand each of those characters.

cards.name: Knights of the Vale
cards.text: Assault. Renown. No attachments. Challenges Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a defending House Arryn character you control. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +3 STR (double its STR instead if your initiative value is 0).

cards.name: Littlefinger
cards.text: Insight. Reaction: After you win a challenge, each player must choose a card from their hand or shadows area, if able. Then, reveal the chosen cards. If your revealed card is a different card type to the others, stand Littlefinger and have him gain 1 power. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Anya Waynwood
cards.text: Reaction: After a challenge is initiated against you, kneel a neutral location to choose an attacking character with an equal or lower printed cost. Kneel that character and take control of it until the end of the challenge.

cards.name: Sweetrobin
cards.text: No attachments except Title. Immune to plot effects. Forced Reaction: After a player initiates a [military] challenge, they must either (choose one): reveal each card in their hand and shadows area, or reduce the claim value on their revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge.

cards.name: Alayne Stone
cards.text: Stealth. If you control Sansa Stark, attach Alayne Stone to her as a duplicate. While Alayne Stone is standing during the challenges phase, each player cannot trigger card abilities on in-faction Lord or Lady characters they control.

cards.name: Harry the Heir
cards.text: While you control a House Arryn Lady character, Harry the Heir gains a [power] icon and stealth. Challenges Action: During a challenge in which you are the defending player, choose a non-participating, kneeling character with printed cost equal to or higher than your initiative value. That character is considered to be participating as a defender on your side. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Mord
cards.text: While Mord is standing, treat the printed text box of each character with a jail token as if it were blank (except for Traits). Reaction: After Mord enters play, place a jail token on a character.

cards.name: Nestor Royce
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Nestor Royce is defending, reveal a card from your hand and place it on the bottom of your deck to stand a defending neutral character with equal or lower printed cost. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Maester Colemon
cards.text: Dominance Action: Kneel a unique Maester character to choose a Condition or Item attachment with a lower printed cost. Take control of that attachment and move it to another eligible character. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Ser Vardis Egen
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Ser Vardis Egan is defending, sacrifice him to return an attacking non-Army character to it's owner's hand.

cards.name: Benjicot
cards.text: Insight. Forced Reaction: After Benjicot stands, reveal the bottom card of each player's deck. Add each card that shares a Trait with Benjicot to it's owners hand and discard the others.

cards.name: Lord Protector's Retainer
cards.text: Ambush (X). X is 1 higher than your initiative value. Forced Reaction: After a challenge is initiated, return Lord Protector's Retainer to your hand.

cards.name: Winged Knight
cards.text: Each House Arryn character you control gets +1 STR. Interrupt: When a Lord or Lady character is killed, remove Winged Knight from the game to place that character on the bottom of its owner's deck instead of placing it in their dead pile.

cards.name: Knight of the Vale
cards.text:
While the attacking player has a higher initiative value than you, Knight of the Vale does not kneel when declared as a defender.
-1 Initiative.

cards.name: The Eyrie
cards.text: No attachments except Fortification. While The Eyrie is standing, increase the cost of the first in-faction card each player marshals, ambushes, or plays each phase by 1 (2 instead if your initiative is 0). Interrupt: When you would lose initiative, kneel The Eyrie to win initiative. -2 Initiative. +2 Reserve.

cards.name: The Bloody Gate
cards.text: While The Bloody Gate is standing and you control a defending House Arryn character, reduce the claim value on the attacking player's revealed plot card by 1. Forced Reaction: After the challenge phase begins, you cannot initiate [military] or [power] challenges this phase unless you kneel The Bloody Gate.

cards.name: The Vale of Arryn
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge, draw 1 card for each defending House Arryn character you control (to a maximum of 5). -2 Initiative.

cards.name: The Highroad
cards.text: Limited. Action: Kneel and sacrifice The Highroad to reduce the cost of the next non-character card you marshal or play this phase by 2. +1 Income.

cards.name: Lord Protector of the Vale
cards.text: Lord character with printed cost 6 or higher only. Attached character gains the House Arryn trait. If attached character is Littlefinger, he gains renown. Reaction: After you draw a House Arryn card, reveal it to gain 1 gold. -1 Initiative.

cards.name: Lysa's Letter
cards.text: Challenges Action: Choose a player and name a challenge type. While that player has not initiated a challenge of that type this phase, set the claim value on their revealed plot card to 0 until the end of the phase.

cards.name: The Seed is Strong
cards.text: Play only if you control a unique House Arryn character or Stannis Baratheon. Reaction: After you lose initiative, the winning opponent must choose and discard a Lord or Lady character from their hand or shadows area unless they reveal a hand and shadows area containing no Lord or Lady characters.

cards.name: Condemned to the Moon Door
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose a non-Army character. At the end of the round, if that character is still in play, kneel your faction card to kill it (cannot be saved).

cards.name: Wardens of the East
cards.text: While there are no other revealed Siege plot cards, you cannot be the first player. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control a defending House Arryn character, increase the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the phase (to a maximum of 3).

cards.name: Banner of the Falcon
cards.text: You cannot include more than 12 in-faction cards in your deck. While you do not control an attacking House Arryn character, reduce the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1. Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR, if it is: - a [military] challenge, choose a participating character and have it gain 1 power. - an [intrigue] challenge, draw a card. - a [power] challenge, choose and stand a participating character.
